item.name: CATAN
item.comment: Initial placement & unlucky rolls can make this game very punishing. Often times there's notuch you can do or could've done differently. 5 as it is a classic, would've been a 4 otherwise.

item.name: Europa Universalis: The Price of Power
Games from the Deep, Dark Wood
The Goonies Game
item.comment: Played it twice because I wasnt sure we played it correctly the first time. The game is incredibly linear - it feels like a convoluted cooperative game of Goose. 3 points for being thematic and looking pretty good. Unfortunately I couldn't give any points for the actual gameplay.

item.name: HEXplore It: The Valley of the Dead King
Jaipur
item.comment: Played it a few times but ended up being not in-depth enough for my liken. It's a good quick game great to fill 30m or so but for me it doesn't really stand on its own.

item.name: The Pursuit of Happiness: Big Box
Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game
item.comment: Absolutely adore this game (best w/ the 2 expansions), it's long but certainly doesn't feel it. If anything I always feel the game finishes too early!

item.name: This War of Mine: The Board Game
Through the Ages: A New Story of Civilization
Ticket to Ride Legacy: Legends of the West
Too Many Bones
item.comment: Pretty sure we got quite a few rules wrong but had a blast.

item.name: War of the Ring: Second Edition
